alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Merrimack; Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 16 at 9:47AM EDT until July 16 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EDT THIS MORNING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MERRIMACK, EAST CENTRAL HILLSBOROUGH AND WEST CENTRAL ROCKINGHAM COUNTIES... At 947 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. The expected rainfall rate is 2 to 3 inches in 1 hour. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Manchester, Derry, Merrimack, Bedford, Hooksett, Amherst, New Boston, Goffstown and Weare. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...2-3 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
